1. Create login screen
- Libraries to use: jquery, jqueryui, aristo
- Create login form
- Create click function for form
- Create notifications for success and failure

2. Main Page
- Use a layout engine for a desktop feel
- Using jlayout
- specify the zones to be used
- specify scroll behavior for the action panel, will handle the address list later.

2b. Set bounds for Main Page
- Resize window on load
- Set min width and heights

3. Start CRUD functions
- Add new contact
- Edit contact
- Delete contact
- List all contacts

4. Add CRUD functions to menu bar

#. Configure the window environment
- Set the application title
_
